meanings.definition: A type of engineered wood product made from wood chips, sawmill shavings, or sawdust.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used particleboards to build the shelves in the garage.
meanings.sent2: The furniture store sells affordable particleboards for DIY projects.
meanings.sent3: When the termite tried to eat the particleboards, it got a splinter in its teeth!
meanings.sent4: The walls of the treehouse were as sturdy as particleboards, holding up against the wind.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh particleboards filled the workshop, reminding him of his childhood home renovations.

meanings.definition: Boards made from particles of wood compressed and bonded together with resin.
meanings.sent1: She stacked the particleboards neatly in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: The construction crew unloaded a truck full of particleboards for the new building project.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat used the particleboards as a scratching post, leaving tiny claw marks.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like particleboards, strong and interconnected to form a solid plan.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a vibrant mural on the particleboards, turning them into a work of art.
